7. two points a and b are 4 m apart on a smooth horizontal surface.  a light elastic string, 
of natural length 0.8 m and modulus of elasticity 15 n, has one end attached to the point 
a.  a light elastic string, of natural length 0.8 m and modulus of elasticity 10 n, has one 
end attached to the point b.  a particle p of mass 0.2 kg is attached to the free end of each 
string.  the particle rests in equilibrium on the surface at the point c on the straight line 
between a and b.
 
(a) show that the length of ac is 1.76 m.
(4)
 
the particle p is now held at the point d on the line ab such that 2.16 m. the
